name: Medicine
title: Our Hospital Always Provide Good Services
subTitle: Medicines can treat diseases and improve your health. If you are like most people, you need to take medicine
descripton: Medicine has been practiced since prehistoric times, during most of which it was an art (an area of skill and knowledge) frequently having connections to the religious and philosophical beliefs of local culture. For example, a medicine man would apply herbs and say prayers for healing, or an ancient philosopher and physician would apply bloodletting according to the theories of humorism
